info.task: navigate to next colum containing link in grid
info.title: Navigate to the next colum containing a link in a grid in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSecondDataCell
setupScript.description: sets focus on the second cell of the second row in the grid

user: Navigate to the next column containing a link in the grid.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the next column containing a link in the grid.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Text of the column header ('Description') is conveyed
coordinates of the cell (column 3, row 2) are conveyed
